name: fedramp-compliance
description: FedRAMP authorization compliance with security controls, continuous monitoring, and documentation
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: FedRAMP Compliance
card.description: Federal cloud authorization with continuous monitoring

summary.overview: FedRAMP authorization compliance suite with control baseline assessment, continuous monitoring, POA&M management, SSP documentation, and vulnerability scanning integration.
summary.exampleUseCase: Map your controls to FedRAMP baselines, track POA&M items to resolution, generate SSP documentation, and integrate vulnerability scan results for continuous authorization.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Pre-mapped control baselines reduce manual mapping. POA&M tracking integrated with workflow engine. SSP templates follow current 3PAO expectations.
